item.title: Indiana Attorney General Subpoenas Amazon, Sues Indianapolis Schools Over Migrant Trafficking
item.description: Attorney General Todd Rokita issued subpoenas for information about potential labor trafficking from Amazon, the city of Fort Wayne, and a nonprofit s...

item.title: Yes, President Trump Can Pardon The 77 People Prosecuted For 2020 Election Integrity Efforts
item.description: Media wrongly insist that the pardon clause only applies to federal charges, yet every attempt to narrow the scope of pardons has failed.

item.title: The American Revolution Is About To Experience The ‘Ken Burns Effect’
item.description: As our nation nears its 250th birthday, Ken Burns’ miniseries should give us a newfound appreciation for the sacrifices of our ancestors.

item.title: To Win The War For America, The GOP Needs To Realize It’s Happening
item.description: A big number of so-called fellow citizens would cheer if you or I died tomorrow, which leads to only one conclusion: We’re playing for keeps.

item.title: Prepare For Doctors To Smuggle Suicide And Trans Drugs Into Red States Like Abortion Pills
item.description: State shield laws protecting abortion providers set a dangerous precedent — doctors could mail other dangerous drugs across state lines.
